value.title: Export Formatted Data Tables to Excel in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces".
